content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the door in this query description: "If facing the wall with the yellow page and mirror, its the door on the right.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

To find the door, I looked for the wall with the yellow page and mirror. In view 3, you can see a wall with a yellowish hue and what appears to be a reflective surface, likely the mirror. The door on the right side of this wall is visible in this view, making it the clearest view of the target object.
